Class SimpleFastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I>

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.AbstractFastPreferenceData<U,​I>
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data.updateable.preference.fast.updateable.AbstractFastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I>
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data.updateable.preference.fast.updateable.StreamsAbstractFastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I>
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data.updateable.preference.fast.updateable.SimpleFastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I>

I - type of the items
All Implemented Interfaces:
es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.index.ItemIndex<I>, es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.index.UserIndex<U>, es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.preference.PreferenceData<U,​I>, es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.index.FastItemIndex<I>, es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.index.FastUserIndex<U>, es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.FastPreferenceData<U,​I>, FastUpdateableItemIndex<I>, FastUpdateableUserIndex<U>, UpdateableItemIndex<I>, UpdateableUserIndex<U>, FastUpdateablePointWisePreferenceData<U,​I>, FastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I>, UpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I>, Updateable<U,​I>, java.io.Serializable, org.ranksys.core.preference.PointWisePreferenceData<U,​I>, org.ranksys.fast.preference.FastPointWisePreferenceData<U,​I>
public class SimpleFastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I>
extends StreamsAbstractFastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I>
implements FastUpdateablePointWisePreferenceData<U,​I>, java.io.Serializable
Simple implementation of FastPreferenceData backed by nested lists.
Author:
SaÃºl Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es), Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es)

    • updatePreference

      private boolean updatePreference​(int idx, double value, java.util.List<es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.IdxPref> list)
      Updates a preference.
      Parameters:
      idx - the identifier of the preference to add.
      value - the rating value.
      list - the list in which we want to update the preference.
      Returns:
      true if the rating was added, false if it was just updated.

    • load

      public static <U,​ I> SimpleFastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I> load​(java.util.stream.Stream<org.jooq.lambda.tuple.Tuple3<U,​I,​java.lang.Double>> tuples, FastUpdateableUserIndex<U> uIndex, FastUpdateableItemIndex<I> iIndex)
      Loads a SimpleFastPreferenceData from a stream of user-item-value triples.
      Type Parameters:
      U - user type
      I - item type
      Parameters:
      tuples - stream of user-item-value triples
      uIndex - user index
      iIndex - item index
      Returns:
      an instance of SimpleFastPreferenceData containing the data from the input stream

    • load

      public static <U,​ I,​ O> SimpleFastUpdateablePreferenceData<U,​I> load​(java.util.stream.Stream<org.jooq.lambda.tuple.Tuple4<U,​I,​java.lang.Double,​O>> tuples, org.jooq.lambda.function.Function4<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Double,​O,​? extends es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.IdxPref> uIdxPrefFun, org.jooq.lambda.function.Function4<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Double,​O,​? extends es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.IdxPref> iIdxPrefFun, FastUpdateableUserIndex<U> uIndex, FastUpdateableItemIndex<I> iIndex, java.util.function.Function<es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.IdxPref,​es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.preference.IdPref<I>> uIdPrefFun, java.util.function.Function<es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.IdxPref,​es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.preference.IdPref<U>> iIdPrefFun)
      Loads a SimpleFastPreferenceData from a stream of user-item-value-other tuples. It can accomodate other information, thus you need to provide sub-classes of IdxPref IdPref accomodating for this new information.
      Type Parameters:
      U - user type
      I - item type
      O - additional information type
      Parameters:
      tuples - stream of user-item-value-other tuples
      uIdxPrefFun - converts a tuple to a user IdxPref
      iIdxPrefFun - converts a tuple to a item IdxPref
      uIndex - user index
      iIndex - item index
      uIdPrefFun - user IdxPref to IdPref converter
      iIdPrefFun - item IdxPref to IdPref converter
      Returns:
      an instance of SimpleFastPreferenceData containing the data from the input stream
